title: Ticket #2997: User priority factors: Track historic values/comments
description:
From a brief discussion with khahn: User priority factors have a number of limitations during administration:

  • Priority factors are stored internally to Condor. There is no information about previous factors and when they were changed. Were the information stored in a configuration file, you could use standard revision control systems, or even just comments, but neither is a practical option here.
  • Similarly, there is no good place to log why a given priority was issued. Again, in a configuration file you you could use comments, but that's not an option.
